report.title: DXM and 'The Test'
report.bodytext: I just wanted to say that I have taken many drug tests in the past while on DXM without a hitch. When I say 'on DXM', I mean that I had dosed about an hour and a half to two hours before the test. /n /n I have one of the tests and it said that the following were tested for: /n Cocaine /n Marijuana /n Opiates/Morphine /n Amphetamines /n Methamphetamine /n Phencyclidine /n Benzodiazepine /n Barbituate /n Oxycodone /n Methylenedioxymethamphetamine /n /n It was a urine test done in a lab. /n /n Tolerance MAY be an issue. I had been taking DXM fairly regularly for approximately four years. DXM is great. It drains my soul, but it's fun at the time!
